title: Bloomberg Markets: Rupp on Renewed Fears of Retail Slump
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Rupp on Renewed Fears of Retail Slump
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Lindsey Rupp Reporter Bloomberg Editorial Discussing concerns that the department-store industry is mired in a slump on the heels of sales declines at Macy’s Inc. and Kohl’s.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
